comment: This update has totally messed up my web searches. I can reach a url site but no info appears and the site is unusable as interactive. Update: Google reply only suggestion was to make sure I'm connected to the Internet. I find that insulting. Of course I was Internet connected. The problem is not with my abilities but with the Google update. There is def something wrong with it. I uninstalled the latest version and now my searches work.
key sentence: After receiving a suggestion from Google to check internet connection, the user feels insulted because they are already connected, and they believe the issue is with the app update itself.
